Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2010 03:06AM - edited Aug 20, 2010 03:07AM by MBrads I was just dianoised with stage 1 breast cancer Had my annual mamogram on 7/12, ultrasound on 7/15, saw surgeon on 7/16, had the biopsey on 7/21 and lumpectomy on 7/28.  Met with the medical radiologist 8/18 and medical oncologist on 8/19. tumor was 1.6 cm - Ductal Carcinomo cancer 3 lymph nodes removed all clean, removed lemon size all surrounding tissue was clean, estrogen receptor is +, progesterone receptor is + and Her-2-New was negative - all good news Dr ordered the Oncotype test today and if it comes back 1 I have to make the decision to have chemo or not.  I will do the 5 days a week for 6 weeks of radiation and also recommended to take Tamoxifen for 5 years because I am pre-menapause. So the more input I can get would be great.  If anyone has any suggestions please pass them on by to me mb
Posts.Title: Just had lumpectomy and still confused ccdh MBrads
